info.name: Dark-GitLab
info.description: Dark theme for GitLab and self-hosted instances. Also supports far greater color customization, custom dark and light color-schemes and many custom features in UserCSS format at GitLab.
info.additionalInfo: More information is available in the Dark-GitLab project. USo will be used only to reach more users and will be updated every once in a while. The screenshot features Gruvbox theme, but the theme doesn't come with it out of the box.

settings.label: Want to customize settings? Install the UserCSS version of this theme from GitHub.
